official-title.#text: Supporting the goals and ideals of

committee-name.#text: Committee on Education and the Workforce

cosponsor.#text: Mr. Danny K. Davis of Illinois

cosponsor.#tail: ) submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the

text.#text: supports the goals and ideals of

honors and recognizes the importance of middle level education and the contributions of those who
			 educate this unique age group; and

quote.#tail:
by taking opportunities to visit schools that educate middle grades students and celebrate the
			 schools that are responsible for educating the Nation's young adolescents.

text.#text: encourages the people of the United States to observe

Whereas the National Association of Secondary School Principals, the Association for Middle Level
			 Education, the National Forum to Accelerate Middle Grades Reform, and the
			 National Association of Elementary School Principals have declared the
			 month of March 2014 as

Whereas schools that educate middle grades students play a critical function in the Nation's
			 educational system in that they are responsible for educating young
			 adolescents between the ages of 10 and 15 (grades 5 through 9) that are
			 undergoing rapid and dramatic changes in their physical, intellectual,
			 social, emotional, and moral development;

Whereas each day nearly 24,000,000 young adolescents enter school deserving what research and
			 practice have shown to help middle grades students achieve, including
			 challenging and engaging instruction, teachers and administrators that are
			 knowledgeable and prepared in order to provide young adolescents with a
			 safe, challenging, and supportive learning environment, and organizational
			 structures that banish anonymity and promote personalization,
			 collaboration, and social equity;

Whereas in order to improve graduation rates and prepare students to be life-long learners ready
			 for college, career, and citizenship, a deeper public understanding of the
			 distinctive mission of the middle level is necessary; and

quote.#tail: by numerous educational groups: Now, therefore, be it

text.#text: Whereas the month of March 2014 has been declared as

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HRES 521 IH: Supporting the goals and ideals of “National Middle Level Education Month”.
